entry.title: [SQ] What makes someone autistic? I went out with a hot girl and described myself as
entry.content: What makes someone autistic? I went out with a hot girl and described myself as sort of autistic. Assume a decent amount of people here are in that group. And nowadays that’s databale. Like I have text receipts where I got in an argument with someone and they made fun of me for being autistic. Sort of work in HFT. I went to math tournaments as a kid. So I guess my question is what’s like an autistic versus I’m a normie who can do math. I guess musks claimed it but is he really that or just smart? Nowadays it’s beneficial to just let people put you in that group.
